databaseQueries.query: SELECT * FROM "users" WHERE "email" = 'test@domain.com' LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM "users" WHERE "users"."id" = '1' LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM "access_control_structure" WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY "parent_id" ASC
SELECT * FROM "user_products" WHERE "user_products"."user_id" = '1' and "user_products"."user_id" IS not NULL

SELECT * FROM "access_controls" WHERE ("product_id" = '1' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '5')) or ("product_id" = '2' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '11')) or ("product_id" = '3' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '17')) or ("product_id" = '5' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '229')) or ("product_id" = '4' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '20')) or ("product_id" = '8' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '807')) or ("product_id" = '7' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '407')) or ("product_id" = '6' and ("user_id" = '1' or "group_id" = '307'))
SELECT * FROM "user_products" WHERE "user_products"."user_id" = '1' and "user_products"."user_id" IS not NULL
SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'assignments'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "assignments" inner join "atoms" on "assignments"."atom_entity_id" = "atoms"."entity_id" left join "comments" on "assignments"."atom_entity_id" = "comments"."atom_entity_id" WHERE "atoms"."product_id" = '1' and "assignments"."user_id" = '1' and "task_end" IS NULL GROUP BY "atoms"."entity_id", "assignments"."id" ORDER BY "assignments"."id" ASC

SELECT COUNT(comments.text) AS count, "assignments"."id", "assignments"."atom_entity_id", "assignments"."user_id", "assignments"."task_id", "assignments"."task_end", "assignments"."created_at", "assignments"."updated_at", "assignments"."created_by" FROM "assignments" inner join "atoms" on "assignments"."atom_entity_id" = "atoms"."entity_id" left join "comments" on "assignments"."atom_entity_id" = "comments"."atom_entity_id" WHERE "atoms"."product_id" = '1' and "assignments"."user_id" = '1' and "task_end" IS NULL GROUP BY "atoms"."entity_id", "assignments"."id" ORDER BY "assignments"."id" ASC LIMIT 100 offset 0

SELECT * FROM "atoms" WHERE "product_id" = '1' and "id" in (SELECT "id" FROM "atoms" WHERE "id" in (SELECT MAX(id) FROM "atoms" GROUP BY "entity_id") and "deleted_at" IS NULL ORDER BY "alpha_title" ASC) and "entity_id" in ('57b74356c5278197332109', '57b74356c4742435054576', '57b7435665acb075679771', '57b74356c80c5907712170', '57b743602582a420140661', '57b74356b0f24728161186', '57b74356b27a9140113058', '57b743596a41e726096824', '57b7435977af7422037938') and "atoms"."deleted_at" IS NULL ORDER BY "sort" ASC

SELECT "comments".* FROM "comments" inner join "atoms" on "comments"."atom_entity_id" = "atoms"."entity_id" WHERE "atom_entity_id" in ('57b743596a41e726096824', '57b7435665acb075679771', '57b7435977af7422037938', '57b74356b0f24728161186', '57b74356b27a9140113058', '57b743602582a420140661', '57b74356c4742435054576', '57b74356c5278197332109', '57b74356c80c5907712170') and "product_id" = '1' and "comments"."deleted_at" IS NULL GROUP BY "comments"."id" ORDER BY "comments"."id" ASC

SELECT id, text,
            unnest(xpath('//query[@type="figure"]/suggestion/text()', XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT CONCAT('<root>', text, '</root>'))::xml)) as reviewstatus,
            unnest(xpath('//query[@type="figure"]/component[@type="figure"]/ce_caption/text()', XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT CONCAT('<root>', text, '</root>'))::xml)) as caption,
            unnest(xpath('//query[@type="figure"]/component[@type="figure"]/credit/text()', XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT CONCAT('<root>', text, '</root>'))::xml)) as credit,
            unnest(xpath('//query[@type="figure"]/component[@type="figure"]/file/@src', XMLPARSE(DOCUMENT CONCAT('<root>', text, '</root>'))::xml)) as figurefile FROM comments
            WHERE atom_entity_id='57b743596a41e726096824'
